text: true that!! try o understand the positive message behind this :) Today one of the challenges is that our modern society allows BOYS to grow older without growing up or maturing,may be due to many of them are living without any role model.There is a version of men that is toxic not ALL MEN.Society is in desperate need of a boundary re-set. The Basics o masculinity and Feminity is Written to provoke conversation and teach the value of polarity of sexes at the same time being incredibly educational.#pusillanimous #polarityexpert #masculinityfeminity
